text:
```    ...
    stream = trading.streaming.create_historical_generator_stream(
        file_path=path,
        listener=listener
    )

    with patch("builtins.open", smart_open.open):
        g = stream.get_generator()
        for market_books in g():
            ...```

text: We can benchmark using the dummy strategy by the way. The patching method that <@UBS7QANF3> suggested is very easy. Using bz2, in some simple backtests I see runtime increase 3-6% but space saving is 8-10X. Well worth the speed vs space saving for my use case.
